pt-BR.name: Pote com Pé
pt-BR.origin: Doação Preta de Zé Gomes, Alto dos Gomes
pt-BR.description: Potes de barro são recipientes tradicionais feitos de argila moldada e cozida, usados para armazenar alimentos, água e outros itens, sendo duráveis e versáteis.

en.name: Footed Pot
en.origin: DONATION FROM PRETA OF ZÉ GOMES, ALTO DOS GOMES
en.description: The clay pot is a traditional container made from molded clay and kiln-fired, historically used to store food, water, and other items. Clay pots are widely associated with cultural and artisanal practices across various regions, valued for their durability, versatility, and thermal properties.

es.name: Olla de Barro con Base
es.origin: DONACIÓN PRETA DE ZÉ GOMES, ALTO DOS GOMES
es.description: Las ollas de barro son recipientes tradicionales hechos de arcilla moldeada y cocida, usados para almacenar alimentos, agua y otros artículos, siendo duraderas y versátiles.
